Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.Actor
public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
object of class Actor is the basic element of the Space game. Basically, the "space" is an array of Actor's objects, and the game game is to change each element (icon) in the array (ie. change 'A' to null) to make the spaceship and the asteroid looks like "flying". So the attribute as char icon is essential. Also, it's necessary to identify whether the icon has been moved in the specific round (turn), so the attribute as Boolean isMoved is a must, too.
Since:
Feb 11, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
mikew

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private char icon
    in this case,icon will be 'S' representing 'spaceship', or 'A' as 'asteroid' access modifier is private, so that it can not be modified outside this class
    private boolean isMoved
    if isMoved is false, the specific Actor object is available to move this round; after being moved, the value should be switch to true;

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Actor()
    default constructor, call the constructor Actor(char icon), and set the defualt value of icon as 'A'
    Actor​(char icon)
    one-parametered constructor, call constructor Actor(char icon, boolean isMoved) set the default value of isMoved as false;
    Actor​(char icon, boolean isMoved)
    two-parameterd constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    char getIcon()
    to get the value of icon, it will be used in the SpaceExplorationSimulator class to identify whether the current element in the array is a spaceship or an asteroid
    boolean isMoved()
    to identify if the element has been moved
    void setIcon​(char icon)
    to set the value of icon
    void setMoved​(boolean isMoved)
    to set the boolean value, so as to make the element availabe to move or not

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • icon

      private char icon
      in this case,icon will be 'S' representing 'spaceship', or 'A' as 'asteroid' access modifier is private, so that it can not be modified outside this class

    • isMoved

      private boolean isMoved
      if isMoved is false, the specific Actor object is available to move this round; after being moved, the value should be switch to true;

  • Constructor Details

    • Actor

      public Actor()
      default constructor, call the constructor Actor(char icon), and set the defualt value of icon as 'A'

    • Actor

      public Actor​(char icon)
      one-parametered constructor, call constructor Actor(char icon, boolean isMoved) set the default value of isMoved as false;
      Parameters:
      icon - : 'A' for asteroid, 'S' for spaceship

    • Actor

      public Actor​(char icon, boolean isMoved)
      two-parameterd constructor
      Parameters:
      icon - 'A' for asteroid, 'S' for spaceship
      isMoved - true means that it has moved, false means it can be moved

  • Method Details

    • getIcon

      public char getIcon()
      to get the value of icon, it will be used in the SpaceExplorationSimulator class to identify whether the current element in the array is a spaceship or an asteroid
      Returns:
      the value of icon, usually be 'A'(asteroid) or 'S'(spaceship) in this case

    • setIcon

      public void setIcon​(char icon)
      to set the value of icon
      Parameters:
      icon - usually input 'A'(asteroid) or 'S'(spaceship) in this case

    • isMoved

      public boolean isMoved()
      to identify if the element has been moved
      Returns:
      if the element has been moved, return true; if not, return false, means that the element is available to move this round

    • setMoved

      public void setMoved​(boolean isMoved)
      to set the boolean value, so as to make the element availabe to move or not
      Parameters:
      isMoved - input true, if the element has been moved in this round; input false, makes it available to move
